pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============django-alipay2==============提供django下alipay直接支付接口Quick start-----------1. Install:: pip install django_alipay22. Add "alipay" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'alipay', ]3. [Optional] Include the alipay URLconf in your project urls.py like this:: url(r'^alipay/', include('alipay.urls')),4. Migrate:: python manage.py migrate5. Add config 'ALIPAY' to settings.py like this:: # account below is for sandbox ALIPAY = { 'pid': '2088101122136241', 'key': '760bdzec6y9goq7ctyx96ezkz78287de', 'seller_email': 'overseas_kgtest@163.com', 'gateway': 'https://openapi.alipaydev.com/gateway.do?', 'server_url': 'http://localhost:8000' # RSA specified 'rsa_public_raw_key': '', 'sign_type': 'RSA', } # you may add an 'api_provider' to support multiple seller ALIPAY = { 'api_provider': 'some_package.sub_package.get_alipay_alipay' # input:seller_email, output:AlipayAPI }6. Create alipay redirect:: import uuid payment = AlipayPayment.objects.create( out_no=uuid.uuid4(), subject='充值', body='1年365元', amount_total=0.01, user=None, # 可以指定user seller_email='your_seller_email@domain.com', # reference_id='1' # 可选 ) return redirect('alipay_redirect', out_no=payment.out_no)
